showScoreExcerpt:
"Really gets into your head...The power of this story is enough to knock you flat...Transporting, is one word for 'The Encounter'; it takes you into the minds of other humans and into the darkest shadows of the jungle, but it is also, at its essence, simple storytelling. As McBurney points out at the beginning of the piece, winding yarns is a primal, vital instinct that sets us apart from other species. And this is a demonstration of that instinct at its very best."
